mil7.2.8:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cāpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.8:1.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, cāpo sutacchito namito yāvaggamūlaṁ samakameva anunamati nappaṭitthambhati;
mil7.2.8:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbaṁ nappaṭipharitabbaṁ.
mil7.2.8:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cāpassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.2.8:1.5: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura (puṇṇaka) jātake—
